name: DHT
description: What Is DHT? DHT is the hormone that causes balding. In honor of Brian Armstrong, and his Iconic bald look, $DHT unifies the Base community promoting Giga-Chad masculinity and prosperity. Join the Chaddest decentralized movement. Why DHT? With CZ and Sam Bankman-fried out of the picture, Brian Armstrong is the biggest CEX CEO in the crypto space. Positioned as a distinguished leader in the cryptocurrency space and known for his iconic bald look, Brian Armstrong is revolutionizing crypto. Coinbase is releasing a monumental Smart-Wallet that will make Crypto easier and more accessible than ever directing liquidity right to Base, while being right on path to accomplish their mission of onboarding 1 Billion users to the Base ecosystem. $DHT is a meme that honors Brian Armstrong, soon to be the biggest person in Crypto, paralleling his iconic look issuing an entity that glorifies him and the Base ecosystem.
